Info: Wellcome to our complex of servers L2Games.net
Information about the server:
Rate Xp = 12.
Rate Sp = 12.
Rate Adena = 12.
Community (Alt+B):
Services, Shop, Buffer, Teleport. Enchantment:
Minimum - 10,
Maximum - 40.
Enter the command .noble on to become noble
Useful commands:
.offline - offline trade mode
.cfg - additional settings of the game
.repair - sends the character to the nearest town
.whoami - more information about the character
Enjoy the game!
